options.content: AIR QUALITY INDEX (ICA)

Good
Fair
Moderate
Poor
Very poor
Extremely poor

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(no2) as "NO2"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(o3_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 7 PRECEDING) as "O3"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(o3) as o3_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(so2) as "SO2"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(pm25_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 23 PRECEDING) as "PM2.5"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(pm25) as pm25_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(pm10_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 23 PRECEDING) as "PM10"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(pm10) as pm10_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

options.content:
# Concentration bands and index categories The air quality index bands have been established taking into consideration the relative risks associated with short-term exposure to PM2,5, O3 y NO2, as established by the World Health Organisation (3) and in the case of SO2, the limit values set out in the EU Air Quality Directive.
| Index Category | SO2 | O3 | NO2 | PM2,5 | PM10 | | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | | GOOD | 0-100 | 0-50 | 0-40 | 0-10 | 0-20 | | FAIR | 101-200 | 51-100 | 41-90 | 11-20 | 21-40 | | MODERATE | 201-350 | 101-130 | 91-120 | 21-25 | 41-50 | | POOR | 351-500 | 131-240 | 121-230 | 26-50 | 51-100 | | VERY POOR | 501-750 | 241-380 | 231-340 | 51-75 | 101-150 | | EXTREMELY POOR | 501-750 | 381-800 | 341-1000 | 75-800 | 151-1200 |

# Health recommendations The air quality index incorporates health recommendations for the general population and for the sensitive population, in line with the health recommendations of the European air quality index. The sensitive population includes both adults and children with respiratory problems and adults with heart conditions.
| Index Category | Health messages | At-risk groups | General population | | -- | -- | -- | -- | | GOOD | Satisfactory air quality. | Enjoy your outdoor activities as normal. | Enjoy your outdoor activities as normal. | | FAIR | Acceptable air quality, the pollution does not pose a health risk. | Enjoy your outdoor activities as normal. | Enjoy your outdoor activities as normal. | | MODERATE | Air quality is unlikely to affect the general population but may present a moderate risk to at-risk groups. | Consider reducing prolonged and strenuous outdoor activities. People with asthma or respiratory diseases should carefully follow their medication plan. People with heart problems may experience palpitations, difficulty breathing or unusual fatigue. | Enjoy your outdoor activities as normal. However, watch for symptoms such as coughing, sore throat, shortness of breath, excessive fatigue or palpitations. | | POOR | The whole population may experience negative health effects, with risk groups experiencing much more serious effects. | Consider reducing outdoor activities, and either do them indoors or postpone them to when the air quality is good or reasonably good. Follow the medical treatment plan meticulously. | Consider reducing prolonged and vigorous outdoor activities, especially if you experience coughing, shortness of breath or throat irritation. | | VERY POOR | Public health emergency conditions, the entire population may be seriously affected. | Reduce all outdoor activity, and consider indoor activities or postpone them to when the air quality is good or reasonably good. Follow the medical treatment plan meticulously. | Reduce all outdoor activities, and consider reducing outdoor activities, and either do them indoors or postpone them to when air quality is good or reasonably good. | | EXTREMELY POOR | Public health emergency conditions, the entire population may be severely affected. | Avoid prolonged stay outdoors. Follow the medical treatment plan, if applicable, meticulously, and go to an emergency department if your condition worsens. | Reduce all outdoor activities and consider doing activities indoors or postpone them to when air quality is good or reasonably good. Use appropriate protection for work that must be done outdoors. |

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(no2) as "NO2 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(o3_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 7 PRECEDING) as "O3 eight-hour moving average"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(o3) as o3_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(so2) as "SO2 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(pm25_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 23 PRECEDING) as "PM2.5 24h moving average"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(pm25) as pm25_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(pm10_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 23 PRECEDING) as "PM10 24h moving average"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(pm10) as pm10_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(no2) as "NO2 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(o3_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 7 PRECEDING) as "O3 eight-hour moving average"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(o3) as o3_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h'),
  avg(so2) as "SO2 hourly average"
FROM
   ${table:raw} 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(pm25_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 23 PRECEDING) as "PM2.5 24h moving average"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(pm25) as pm25_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t

SELECT $__time(time_index_hour), 
       avg(pm10_hourly_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time_index_hour ASC ROWS 23 PRECEDING) as "PM10 24h moving average"
FROM (SELECT
        $__timeGroup(time_index,'1h', 0) as time_index_hour,
        avg(pm10) as pm10_hourly_avg
      FROM
         ${table:raw} 
      WHERE
        $__timeFilter(time_index) and entity_id = '$device_selected'
      GROUP BY 1
      ORDER BY 1 ASC
      ) as t
